      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response AutoGeneratedPasswordHash(EntityDTO.RequestDTO request, java.lang.StringBuilder safetyid)
      Method to hash password of request body
      The algorithm is hashed (SHA-256) with "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256", and KEY_length is composed of 256.
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response AutoGeneratedUseridHash(EntityDTO.RequestDTO request, java.lang.StringBuilder safetypass)
      Method to hash userid of request body
      The algorithm is hashed (SHA-256) with "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256", and KEY_length is composed of 256.
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response CreateDateTimeAuto(java.lang.StringBuilder date)
      Method to generate the date when the request was received in order to store the date newly registered by the user in DB
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response CreateUserIdentityId(java.lang.StringBuilder uuidforId, java.lang.StringBuilder safetypass, java.lang.StringBuilder identityid)
      A method that concatenates the hashed user ID with the UUID value generated by CreateUserIdentityIdUUID in order to store the user's unique ID in the DB.
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response CreateUserIdentityIdUUID(java.lang.StringBuilder uuidforId)
      A method for generating a unique ID of a user, and a unique value is generated using UUID
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response CreateUserIdentityPassword(java.lang.StringBuilder uuidforPassword, java.lang.StringBuilder safetyid, java.lang.StringBuilder identitypass)
      A method that concatenates the hashed user Password with the UUID value generated by CreateUserIdentityPasswordUUID in order to store the user's unique Password in the DB.
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response CreateUserIdentityPasswordUUID(java.lang.StringBuilder uuidforPassword)
      A method for generating a unique Password of a user, and a unique value is generated using UUID
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response GeneratedErrorResponse(ErrorResponse.ErrorResponseEnum errorresponseenum)
      From the "ErrorResponseEnum" class that defines the error response, add the HTTP Status Code corresponding to each process to the Response Body and return it to the client.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response GeneratedSuccessResponse(ErrorResponse.SuccessResponseEnum successresponseenum)
      The normal status is defined according to each process from the HTTP Status Code generated by the SuccessResponseEnum class, and the HTTP Status Code in the normal process is returned to the client from the SuccessResponse class.
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response InsertDB(EntityDTO.RequestDTO request, java.lang.StringBuilder safetypass, java.lang.StringBuilder safetyid, java.lang.StringBuilder date, java.lang.StringBuilder identityid, java.lang.StringBuilder identitypass)
      A method that stores the information generated by all the above methods and the information received by the request in the DB.
      private javax.ws.rs.core.Response RequestBodyCheck(EntityDTO.UserDTO body, EntityDTO.RequestDTO request)
      Check method to see if all the contents of the request body have been entered
      If there is even one uninput item in the content of the request body, 400 Bad Request is returned to the client.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response service(EntityDTO.UserDTO body, EntityDTO.RequestDTO request)
      Controller methods that support CRUD operations for each method
      The calling method is
      1: RequestBodyCheck (Description: Null check method of request body)
      2: AutoGeneratedUseridHash (Description: Method for hashing userid stored in DB)
      3: AutoGeneratedPasswordHash (Description: Method for hashing Password stored in DB)
      4: CreateDateTimeAuto (Description: Method for managing date and time in each CRUD operation)
      5: CreateUserIdentityIdUUID (Description: Method to make userid unique for each user)
      6: CreateUserIdentityPasswordUUID (Description: Method to make password unique for each user)
      7: CreateUserIdentityId (Description: A method that concatenates a unique userid generated by UUID and a hashed userid)
      8: CreateUserIdentityPassword (Description: A method that concatenates a unique password generated by UUID and a hashed password)
      9: InsertDB (Description: Method to store requested contents in DB)
      Total: 9 Method

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • メソッドの詳細

      • GeneratedErrorResponse

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response GeneratedErrorResponse(ErrorResponse.ErrorResponseEnum errorresponseenum)
        From the "ErrorResponseEnum" class that defines the error response, add the HTTP Status Code corresponding to each process to the Response Body and return it to the client.
        Each status code and message
        Status Error generator class: ErrorResponseEnum
        Status error response generation class: ErrorResponse
        E400(Response.Status.BAD_REQUEST.getStatusCode(), "Error400", "Typo etc.There is an error in the request")
        E401(Response.Status.UNAUTHORIZED.getStatusCode(), "Error401", "certification failed.")
        E403(Response.Status.FORBIDDEN.getStatusCode(), "Error403", "You do not have access.")
        E409(Response.Status.CONFLICT.getStatusCode(), "Error409", "The ID already exists.")
        E409UPDATE(Response.Status.CONFLICT.getStatusCode(),"Error409UPDATE", "Unable to update record")
        E409DELETE(Response.Status.CONFLICT.getStatusCode(),"Error409DELETE" , "Unable to delete record")
        E500(Response.Status.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.getStatusCode(),"Error500", "DB server connection failed")
        パラメータ:
        errorresponseenum -
        戻り値:
        HTTP Response Code according to each status

      • GeneratedSuccessResponse

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response GeneratedSuccessResponse(ErrorResponse.SuccessResponseEnum successresponseenum)
        The normal status is defined according to each process from the HTTP Status Code generated by the SuccessResponseEnum class, and the HTTP Status Code in the normal process is returned to the client from the SuccessResponse class.
        Defined Response Status: S201(Response.Status.CREATED.getStatusCode(), "Success201CREATED","RequestCREATED")
        Response generator: SuccessResponseEnum
        Response return class: SuccessResponse
        パラメータ:
        successresponseenum -
        戻り値:
        HTTP Response Code according to each status

      • service

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response service(EntityDTO.UserDTO body,
                                         EntityDTO.RequestDTO request)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Controller methods that support CRUD operations for each method
        The calling method is
        1: RequestBodyCheck (Description: Null check method of request body)
        2: AutoGeneratedUseridHash (Description: Method for hashing userid stored in DB)
        3: AutoGeneratedPasswordHash (Description: Method for hashing Password stored in DB)
        4: CreateDateTimeAuto (Description: Method for managing date and time in each CRUD operation)
        5: CreateUserIdentityIdUUID (Description: Method to make userid unique for each user)
        6: CreateUserIdentityPasswordUUID (Description: Method to make password unique for each user)
        7: CreateUserIdentityId (Description: A method that concatenates a unique userid generated by UUID and a hashed userid)
        8: CreateUserIdentityPassword (Description: A method that concatenates a unique password generated by UUID and a hashed password)
        9: InsertDB (Description: Method to store requested contents in DB)
        Total: 9 Method
        パラメータ:
        body -
        request -
        戻り値:
        201 CREATED
        例外:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • RequestBodyCheck

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response RequestBodyCheck(EntityDTO.UserDTO body,
                                                   EntityDTO.RequestDTO request)
        Check method to see if all the contents of the request body have been entered
        If there is even one uninput item in the content of the request body, 400 Bad Request is returned to the client.
        パラメータ:
        body -
        request -
        戻り値:
        201 CREATED

      • AutoGeneratedUseridHash

        private javax.ws.rs.core.Response AutoGeneratedUseridHash(EntityDTO.RequestDTO request,
                                                          java.lang.StringBuilder safetypass)
        Method to hash userid of request body
        The algorithm is hashed (SHA-256) with "PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256", and KEY_length is composed of 256.
        パラメータ:
        request -
        safetypass -
        戻り値:
        201 CREATED
        関連項目:
